participant_1.background:
I'm always trying to come up with new beats for my band.
i wear a red purse.
i make my own clothes.
i am a cashier at a grocery store.
The most valued possession I have is my collection of rocks because they remind me of the places I've been and the people I've met.

participant_2.background:
I'm not very close to my family, but I love my garden.
I am an adult who exercises every day to keep my heart and lungs healthy.
I enjoy drawing comics for my grandchildren to enjoy.
i hate that i got my brain from the dad i never met.
I'm looking for a home that is close to grocery stores so I can take advantage of my couponing skills.

content.text: Hey there!
Hey! How are you?
Good, good! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to garden and draw comics.
That's awesome! I like to make my own clothes and rock climb.
Nice! Have you ever made any clothes that you're really proud of?
Yeah, I made a dress that I wore to a wedding last year. It turned out really well!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try rock climbing, but I'm afraid of heights.
It's not so bad! Just start with some easy routes and work your way up.
Yeah, I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What's your favorite thing about gardening?
I love seeing the plants grow and change. It's really rewarding.
I can see why! It's really relaxing to spend time in the garden.
Yeah, it is! I'm glad we had this conversation.
Me too! I'm always looking for new ways to meet people and make friends.
Me too! It's been nice chatting with you.
You too! Have a nice day!
You too
